title: Canadians Head South Of Their Border For Medical Procedures
teaser: A hospital in north Idaho is marketing itself to Canadian tourists -- medical tourists, that is.
contentencoded:
A hospital in north Idaho is marketing itself to Canadian tourists — medical tourists, that is.

From the Here & Now Contributors Network, Jessica Robinson from the Northwest News Network has the story.

  • Read more on this story via Northwest News Network

Reporter

  • Jessica Robinson, inland Northwest correspondent for Northwest News Network, reporting from the bureau in Coeur d’Alene, Idaho. She tweets @jessixarobinson.
